edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.enrichment
Class NyuEnrichmentPlugin

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.NyuPlugin
      edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.enrichment.NyuEnrichmentPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.exlibris.primo.api.plugins.enrichment.EnrichmentPlugin
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataWarehouseEnrichmentPlugin, HttpEnrichmentPlugin
public abstract class NyuEnrichmentPlugin
extends edu.nyu.library.primo.plugins.NyuPlugin
implements com.exlibris.primo.api.plugins.enrichment.EnrichmentPlugin

Base class for enrichment plugins. Extends NyuPlugin and implements the enrichment plugin interface provided by ExLibris.

Author:
Scot Dalton
